title: Veatch Coaches Corridor in Merryman Center to honor Bud Foster - VT hokiesports.com
content: Veatch Coaches Corridor in Merryman Center to honor Bud Foster  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech director of athletics Whit Babcock announced Thursday thatÂ in recognition of Jeff Veatch's continued long history of generosity and service to his alma mater, the corridor on the main level of the Merryman Center and includes the assistant football coaches offices will now be known as the Veatch Coaches Corridor (subject to approval by the Virginia Tech Board of Visitors).
